title: Honoring Robert A. Geiger upon the occasion of his designation as recipient of the Lifetime Achiever of the Year Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Robert A. Geiger upon the occasion of
his designation as recipient of the Lifetime Achiever of the Year  Award
from the Clarence Chamber of Commerce

WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that the
quality and character of life in the communities across New  York  State
are  reflective of the concerned and dedicated efforts of those individ-
uals who would devote themselves to the welfare of the community and its
citizenry; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly  proud  to  honor  Robert  A.
Geiger upon the occasion of his designation as recipient of the Lifetime
Achiever  of  the  Year Award by the Clarence Chamber of Commerce, to be
celebrated at its Annual Awards Dinner on Thursday, February  24,  2011;
and
  WHEREAS,  Raised  in  the Kensington section of Buffalo, Robert Geiger
attended Kensington High School, and graduated from  the  University  of
Buffalo  with a degree in Business Administration and Traffic and Trans-
portation; and
  WHEREAS, After leaving General Mills to complete his  active  military
obligation  in the 98th Regiment of the Army Reserves and upon returning
home accepted a position with the Upson Company of  Lockport;  he  later
married his wife, Patricia in 1960, and then moved to Clarence; and
  WHEREAS,  While  employed  at  the Upson Company, Robert Geiger became
active in the Niagara Community groups; during this time he  was  Presi-
dent  of  Kiwanis  and the Lockport Chamber of Commerce, as well as many
other organizations to help improve the community; and
  WHEREAS, Robert Geiger later became a co-owner of Four Seasons Restau-
rants; after building five local free standing buildings, he  eventually
joined  with  T.G.I.Fridays and partnered with the Country Kitchen Fran-
chise Group; and
  WHEREAS, A member of the Clarence Rotary, Robert Geiger  is  currently
the  Business  Development  Representative  for  the Clarence Chamber of
Commerce and is serving as liaison to the Clarence  Industrial  Develop-
ment Agency (CIDA); he is also a member of the town's Recreation Commit-
tee and a member of the Town of Clarence Zoning Board of Appeals and the
Clarence Avoidable Alarm Committee; and
  WHEREAS,  A  charter  member of the Clarence Toastmasters Club and the
Rotary Liaison for the Clarence Nature Center, Robert Geiger is  also  a
member  of the Nativity of B.V.M. Church, the Clarence Senior Center and
the Clarence Historical Society; and
  WHEREAS, Along with his wife, Patricia, with him throughout have  been
his  children,  Thomas, Timothy, and Sherry, as well as his eight grand-
children, all of whom feel privileged to be  a  part  of  his  life  and
rejoice in his achievements; and
  WHEREAS,  Robert  Geiger's distinguished record merits the recognition
and respectful tribute of this Legislative Body; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor Robert A. Geiger upon the occasion of his designation as recipient
of  the Lifetime Achiever of the Year Award from the Clarence Chamber of
Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Robert A. Geiger.
